solution_line_template: The third boy is {third_boy_age} so the sum of the ages of the first two is {total_sum_ages}-{third_boy_age} = <<{total_sum_ages}-{third_boy_age}={sum_of_first_two_ages}>>{sum_of_first_two_ages}
The ages of the first two boys are equal so each of them is {sum_of_first_two_ages}/{num_boys_same_age} = <<{sum_of_first_two_ages}/{num_boys_same_age}={age_of_each_boy}>>{age_of_each_boy} years
